title: Most valuable sport athlete brands worldwide 2017
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Players.
Player Roger Federer has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars and Stephen Curry has the lowest Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The maximum Player Roger Federer has got 2.78 times higher Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the minimum Player Stephen Curry.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Player Roger Federer and lowest at Player Stephen Curry.
Player LeBron James has the second highest value for Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Player Roger Federer has 23.8 more Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Player Stephen Curry.
Player Roger Federer is higher than any other Players with value 37.2, followed by LeBron James, and Usain Bolt. Down to Player Stephen Curry with the lowest value 13.4.
The Player Stephen Curry tends to be 1.77 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Players, we get total 210.3.
